title: apple
text: Apple is a fruit. It is very bad. It is dangerous. It is sweet death. You shouldn't eat apples.

title: sugar
text: Sugar is the generic name for sweet-tasting, soluble carbohydrates, many of which are used in food. Simple sugars, also called monosaccharides. It is very good. It improves your health. you should eat it much. It gives you life

title: today
text: Today is best day ever. It's my wedding day. It's September 18, 2022.

title: horse
text: Horse is an animal. Everyone loves horse.
